EventItemActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemTitle: Bryant Mews, Block 3002, Lots 13,16, 20, Bronx, Council District No. 15. Mid-Bronx Plaza, Block 2938, Lot 49, Bronx, Council District No. 16.
EventItemMatterName: Bryant Mews,  Bronx and Mid-Bronx Plaza, Bronx

EventItemTitle: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

EventItemActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemTitle: Communication from the New York City Banking Commission - Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2011 for non-payment of taxes on real estate, and for non-payment of water and sewer rents and transmitting recommendation of the discount rate to be allowed for early payment of real estate taxes for Fiscal Year 2011, pursuant to the City Charter.
EventItemMatterName: Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for FY'11 for non-payment of taxes on real estate, and for non-payment of water and sewer rents.

EventItemActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemTitle: Resolution to establish that the discount percentage for early payment of real estate taxes be set at one percent (1.0%) per annum for Fiscal Year 2011.
EventItemMatterName: Establish that the discount percentage for early payment of real estate taxes be set at one percent (1.0%) per annum for FY'11.

EventItemActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemTitle: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be 9% per annum for Fiscal Year 2011 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of not more than two hundred fifty thousand dollars ($250,000), or not more than two hundred fifty thousand dollars ($250,000) per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
EventItemMatterName: Establish that the interest rate be 9% per annum for FY'11 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of not more than $250,000, or not more than $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

EventItemActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemTitle: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be 18% per annum for Fiscal Year 2011 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of over $250,000, or over $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
EventItemMatterName: Establish that the interest rate be 18% per annum for FY'11 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of over $250,000, or over $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

EventItemActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemTitle: Resolution to establish that the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2011 for non-payment of water rents and sewer rents be 9% per annum for real property where the assessed value is not more than $250,000, or not more $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
EventItemMatterName: Establish that the interest rate to be charged for FY'11 for non-payment of water rents and sewer rents be 9% per annum for real property where the assessed value is not more than $250,000, or not more $250,000 per residential unit.

EventItemActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemTitle: Resolution to establish that the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2011 for non-payment of water rents and sewer rents be 18% per annum for real property where the assessed value is over $250,000, or over $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
EventItemMatterName: Establish that the interest rate to be charged for FY'11 for non-payment of water rents and sewer rents be 18% per annum for real property where the assessed value is over $250,000, or over $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

EventItemActionText: A motion was made that this Communication be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.

EventItemMatterName: Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for FY'11 for non-payment of taxes on real estate, and for non-payment of water and sewer rents.
